prompts: Create a ghost-type Pokemon with dark wings and a menacing presence.
Imagine a dragon Pokemon that has a mix of black and yellow colors.
Show me a mythical creature that dominates the shadows and commands fear.
Design a Pokemon with a serpentine body and intimidating spikes on its back.
Generate a legendary Pokemon that thrives in dark, mystical environments.
Make a bipedal Pokemon with an eerie aura and striking color patterns.
Give me a unique Pokemon that embodies both ghostly and dragon-like features.
